item.title: 【UPSCALED】NewJeans - Ditto side A [4K HEVC, HDR Remaster]
item.description:
The video source from Bugs!
- I made the HDR myself ... only 16:9 and 21:9 scene is graded, only Ban Heesoo's footage from her camcorder, I'm not grading it to HDR so it could be more "vintage".
- 4K upscaled
- I'm switching to MEGA now, cause I still couldn't find any good file hosting (if you guys know some, can you guys told me ? :3
